home.title: Home Screen
home.sampleContent: This is sample content to demonstrate scrolling and bottom navigation opacity.

login.emailTitle: To get started, first enter your phone, email, or @username

errors.invalidInputDescription: Please enter a valid email, phone number, or username.
errors.userNotFoundDescription: This user does not exist. Please check your input or register a new account.
errors.unableToVerify: Unable to verify user existence. Please try again.
errors.invalidPasswordDescription: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.invalidLoginDataDescription: Please check your credentials and try again.
errors.unableToLogin: Unable to login. Please try again.

forgotPassword.findAccountDescription: Enter the email, phone number, or username associated with your account to change your password.
forgotPassword.verifyCodeDescription:
checkyour email to get your confirmation code.
 if you need to request a new code, go back and reselect a confirmation.
forgotPassword.resetPasswordDescription:
Make sure your new password is 8 charcters or more.
 Try including numbers,letters, adn 
 punctuation marks for a strong password.

 You'll be logged out of all active X sessions after your password is changed
forgotPassword.twoFactorPrefix: Add an extra layer of security to your account with
forgotPassword.twoFactorSuffix: Enable it in your settings to help make sure that you, and only you, can access your account.

success.title: Password Reset Successful
success.message: Your password has been reset successfully. You can now log in using your new password.

placeholders.tweetsReplies: Tweets and Replies will be shown here.

editModal.title: Edit Profile
editModal.name: Name
editModal.bioPlaceholder: Add a bio to your profile

toasts.userMutedDesc: You will no longer see their posts
toasts.userUnmutedDesc: You will now see their posts
